Our Courses

Hadoop 2.x

Hadoop is an open source, Java-based programming framework that supports the processing and storage of extremely large data sets in a distributed computing environment. It is part of the Apache project sponsored by the Apache Software Foundation.

Spark with Scala

Apache Spark is a fast and general engine for big data processing, with built-in modules for streaming, SQL, machine learning and graph processing. Scala is a programming language that has implemented major functional programming concepts. In Functional programming, every computation is treated as a mathematical function which avoids states and mutable data.

Selenium

ANV Infosystem offers a comprehensive selenium training in pimple saudagar and wakad at lowest fees. Learn Selenium Webdriver, IDE, Grid and Java.

Salesforce

Salesforce Training/Certification course is designed to learn the core administrative features of Salesforce. Tailor the system for your specific implementation based on latest version updated by Salesforce. Our training includes how to administer and configure Salesforce.

DevOps Professional

DevOps is the combination of cultural philosophies, practices, and tools that increases ability of an organization to deliver applications and services at high velocity: evolving and improving products at a faster pace than organizations using traditional software development and infrastructure management processes.

Amazon Web Services (AWS)

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a comprehensive, evolving cloud computing platform provided by Amazon. It provides a mix of infrastructure as a service (IaaS), platform as a service (PaaS) and packaged software as a service (SaaS) offerings.

Java

Advanced Java course provides Struts Framework, Web Application Component development with Servlets, JSP and XML .

TOSCA

Tosca course is a comprehensive introduction to the structural optimization capabilities of Tosca Structure. During the course topology, shape, sizing and bead optimization problems are solved, and results are evaluated.

Angular JS 2

AngularJS is a toolset for building the framework most suited to your application development. It is fully extensible and works well with other libraries. Every feature can be modified or replaced to suit your unique development workflow and feature needs. Read on to find out how.

Microsoft Dynamics CRM

Microsoft Dynamics CRM gives a uniqueness to in leading the way of innovation. It provides a complete cycle from marketing , Sales to Service at one place and that without installing any kind of software if you are using CRM online.

Oracle ATG and Endeca

Oracle Commerce Developer ATG Training gives you the fundamental knowledge and hands-on experience to extend the Oracle Commerce platform and customize Guided Search. Deliver personalized content using Experience Manager.

Performance Testing - Load Runner

Performance testing has proved itself to be crucial for the success of a business. Load testing is a type of performance test where the application is tested for its performance on normal and peak usage.

Hadoop YARN components

Scala – A Scalable Language

Scala stands for “scalable language.” It is certainly not referring to scalability from the application performance perspective. It is a mix of object-oriented and functional programming concepts.
